name: template-matic-desktop
description: App desktop de rellenado de plantillas

scripts.start: cd ng && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && electron-forge start
scripts.package: cd ng && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && electron-forge package
scripts.make: cd ng && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && electron-forge make
scripts.make-win: cd ng && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && electron-forge make --platform=win32
